changes.description: Added the `endpointPrefix` property to the `@aws.api#service` trait.
Added support for `tags` and `deprecated` members to `@waitable` definitions.
Added validation for `@httpHeader` trait values.
Add `required` property for `requestBody` when converting to OpenAPI.
Added more helper methods to `OperationIndex`.

Ensure that names in the `@waitable` trait are unique in the closure of the
service.

Fixed a regression with `@aws.apigateway#authorizors` behavior when setting
the `customAuthType` property without having set its `type` property.

Fixed an issue where modeled headers were not populated in to
`Access-Control-Expose-Headers` in CORS responses.
Added missing `deprecated` member to `@enum` definitions in the prelude model.

Fixed an issue with the conversion of greedy label parameter names in to
OpenAPI.

Fixed an issue in `CodeWriter.popState` where it would not honor custom
expression start characters.

Fixed a potential `NullPointerException` when validating the `@examples`
trait.
Fixed issues with some `@awsQuery` and `@ec2Query` protocol test responses.

Fixed an issue where the `removeTraitDefinitions` build transform was not
registered with the SPI.

Fixed an issue where using an environment variable in `smithy-build.json`
would consume an extra preceding character when performing a replacement.

Update `@waitable` documentation to specify using jitter and account for
overflows.

Added examples and clarified documentation for several HTTP traits, most
importantly `@httpLabel` and `@httpQuery`.
Clarified various aspects of the `@xmlNamespace` trait documentation.
Clarified `@waitable` documentation.

Clarified that the `@pattern` trait does not implicitly match an entire
string.
Fixed various examples in the specification.
Sort `TopDownIndex` contents to provide deterministic results.
Improved error messages when an unknown annotation trait is encountered.

Added `smithy-diff` error when the `@idempotencyTrait` token is removed from a
shape.
